name: Volafile.io Dark/Purple
description: Some colour changes to volafile.io and other things
additional_info:
11/02/2014::Temp fix to new colours for top uploaders


Hide 'hours' just moves things to the right a bit, so it fucks up when things get down to 'mins' If you want to hide hours and removing the scrollbar padding, select YES+remove padding.
It can be done better with JS but I don't like(know)JS

Collection of volafile themes and scripts.
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/7oxsd636jko1a79/Volafile%20themes%20and%20scripts.html

style_settings.label: Tight icon spaces at left of file list
